definitions.definition: To damage or vandalize something, especially a surface, in a visible or conspicuous manner.
examples: After the painting was defaced a decade ago, it went viral and has been a tourist attraction ever since.

definitions.definition: To void or devalue ; to nullify or degrade the face value of.
To alter a coat of arms or a flag by adding an element to it.
examples: You get the Finnish state flag by defacing the national flag with the state coat of arms placed in the middle of the cross.

main_definition: To damage or vandalize something, especially a surface, in a visible or conspicuous manner.
secondary_definitions: To void or devalue ; to nullify or degrade the face value of.
( heraldry , flags ) To alter a coat of arms or a flag by adding an element to it.
